trends: There have been 66 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around September 28th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was out in my front yard watching my dog do her business when i noticed a moving object in the nnw sky. it was moving at a steady pace but what caught my eye was its brightness - sort of a yellowish orange color and not an airplane. it was moving sse in a steady slow motion. it was so odd that i had my wife and adult daughter come outside to view the object. it moved very steadily slightly east of the planet visible in the southern sky which was east of the crescent moon. the brightness, color and size of the object was almost identical to the planet (not sure which one that is this time of year). it went out of site into trees in the sse horizion. i have done a lot of flying in commercial airplanes and have enjoyed star gazing \ looking through telescopes for many years and have never seen anything like this. did i see an orbiting sattelite of the space shuttle perhaps. it was vey weird!
Summary: Looked exactly like the planet visible in the southern sky.
